jhelp.gui.game.keymapper

Class KeyMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.gui.game.keymapper.KeyMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CaptureKeyCodeListener, EventManager, MouseSensitiveAreaListener

    public class KeyMapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements MouseSensitiveAreaListener, CaptureKeyCodeListener, EventManager
    Dialog in JHelpGame2D for be able to change action key mapping with keyboard.
    In other words, change the short cut associated to action key
    Author:
    JHelp

         jhelp.util.gui.JHelpImage imageKeyBackground,
         int keyBackground,
         int select,
         int normal,
         jhelp.util.gui.JHelpFont font)
        Create a new instance of KeyMapper
        Parameters:
        imageBackground - Image background (can be null)
        colorBackground - Color background, used if imageBackground is null
        imageText - Image foreground (can be null)
        colorText - Color foreground, used if imageText is null
        imageKeyForeground - Image key foreground (can be null)
        keyForeground - Color key foreground, used if imageKeyForeground is null
        imageKeyBackground - Image key background (can be null)
        keyBackground - Color key background, used if imageKeyBackground is null
        select - Selected border color
        normal - Normal border color
        font - Font to use
